error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'jayson_age_at_time_1' (10) was used instead of 'dad_age_multiplier' (4).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 88
When Jayson is 10 his dad is 10 x 10 = <<10*10=100>>100 years old.
His mom is 100 - 2 = <<100-2=98>>98 years old.
When Jayson is born, his mom is 98 - 10 = <<98-10=88>>88 years old.
